content.detailedDescription: I was driving home late at night about 1:00 a.M.  from enterprise, utah to saint george, utah (37 miles) and was about half way home, within two miles of veyo, utah, a small town of about two hundred people, traveling south.  i had a good sized hill on my right and as i passed the end of this hill off to my right and slightly ahead (southwest) i observed a very bright searchlight that appeared to have about a fifty - one hundred foot diameter on the ground originating from, i would guess, one hundred feet up.  i was within one half of a mile of this light and it was in an area where it is very sparsely wooded, mostly sagebrush.  i at first thought it was a law enforcement helicopter searching for someone or perhaps the wildlife division counting deer or after a poacher.  as i drew nearer my radio developed a large amount of static, which was odd as i was listening to a cassette tape, and my headlights flickered off and on a couple of times.  i got really scared at this point and then with the quickness of thought the light seemed to gather in but didn't go out, and then it shot straight up and out of sight into the sky, the only reason it disappeared, i believe, is that i couldn't see that far.  the whole event lasting between 30-40 seconds, with the ascension lasting less than 2 seconds, i remember telling myself that there was no man made craft on this planet that could travel that fast, this appeared to be moving faster than a bullet. this was around 1986 and although i don't remember the exact date, i remember the event as if it happened an hour ago.
content.summary: Observed a bright searchlight source about 100 feet up which shot upwards and out of sight in about 2 sec

content.detailedDescription:
the story that i am about to tell you happened the morning of saturday, august 17th at 2:30am (arizona time).

i was about to go to bed when i went onto the back porch as i always do to look at the sky before retiring for the night.  to the west south west and just south of white tanks mountain i was watching a rain storm with allot of lightening in the distance.  now it was a partly cloudy night but you could see the clouds in the sky as they were a dark grey and scattered in their shapes.
there was a bunch of lightening in the distance and i love to watch the lightening.  everytime the lightening struck the ground it would light up the rain falling so you could see the shape of the rain cloud and the streaks of rain falling.  to the right of the lightning (closer over to the white tanks mountain to the west of us i saw one cloud in the sky that was, for some reason lit up fully with a bright white illumination.  the cloud must have been 1/3 of a mile horizontal and only 1/8th of a mile vertical. it was shaped a bit like a cornucopia.  i would guess this cloud was about 5,000 ft up in the sky.
this white illuminated cloud was nothing like all the other clouds in the sky as they were all dark grey in color. all of a sudden on the left end of the cloud a very bright orange ball of light began to emerge moving right to left within the cloud. it appeared to fly slowly out of the cloud and stopped on the left edge outside the cloud.  at first i thought it was an airplane making its way though the cloud. but they always use a white nose light.  i thought this orange ball of light might have illuminated the cloud but this light was a true fiery orange and getting not only brighter but increasing in diameter.
it was so big that if you held an english pea out at full arms length between your thumb and forefinger thats how big it was and just a brilliant orange bright light emerging from the snow white illuminated cloud. if that wasn't strange enough it moved away from the cloud just a bit, then turned right and went back into the white cloud moving left to right.  you could see a slight orange glow from within the white cloud. about 20 seconds later it re-emerged from the cloud, moving right to left but as it returned to the exact same position outside of the left side of the white cloud it stopped and then the orange ball split into 2 additional orange balls of light in the sky.  the three orange balls moved into a triangle pattern where the original ball was in the bottom-left position of the triangle with one above and another to it's right.  then all three orbs started rotating slowly clockwise and vertically. i thought this to incredible to be true.  i knew i needed a witness for this so i ran into the bedroom and woke up my 11 yr. old son from a complete sleep.  he thought i was in his dream.  i finally began to drag him from the bed when he believed me and we ran back out on the back patio with me.  there in the sky we saw the three big orange light balls still circling each other vertically at the edge of the only white illuminated cloud in the sky.  the lightening was intensifying in the storm over there and the lightening was striking the ground about once every 20 or 30 seconds.  amazingly, one of the lightening bolts shot towards the ground but then branched off another bolt and that other lighening bolt curved to the right horizontally and struck one of the rotating orange balls of light circling each other.
the three orange balls then all stopped their rotation and reformed into a single orange light ball the size of all three of their greater masses.  (another words 3x the first orange balls original size.
the orange single ball then moved from left to right back once again into the white cloud and you could see it stop within the cloud as the orange glow grew fainter and smaller until it finally disappeared in about 30 seconds from moving into the cloud.  once the orange ball was extinguished the white illuminated cloud began to shrink horizontally. (both cloud ends shrinking to the clouds center.)   the cloud was losing it's bright white glow and was dimming as it took on  the same dark grey color as their surrounding clouds. in about 3 minutes the cloud was completely gone from the sky.  there was nothing left that i could see in the location the cloud dissipated from.  the storm cloud to the south still continued to rain and lightening.   it was just spectacular to see.  i really and truly think it was a ufo or a group of them.  a light doesn't leave a cloud and then turn abruptly around and go back into the same cloud.  it never lowered it's altitude.  it maintained it's altitude the entire time and would move in and out of the illuminated white cloud.
content.summary: Fireball emerged from cloud and split into 3 orange balls that rotated and rejoined.

content.detailedDescription: Is sightings stop in nomre in 4mintes
content.summary: Flyings around

content.detailedDescription: I was looking in the sky at what i thought was a very bright star. the object was hovering and suddenly started moving than stopped again. i ran to get my cell phone and got video of it. the craft changed directions at amazing angles creating tons of g force. im not saying this is alien craft or military. i do not know what it was. herea the video
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On august fifth i was looking out of my bedroom window and observed this craft in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
i had awakened, used the bathroom, and returned to my room. i have a habit of going to the window (west facing) and looking at the night sky before getting back in bed. at that time of year the moon and orion constellation are up to the left, looking out. the night was crystal clear, calm, and the moonlight exceptionally bright. wanting to locate orion, my gaze was initially to the left. immediately i sensed movement in the sky to my right. i turned and saw a structure moving slowly overhead, brightly lit, and unlike anything i have seen or heard described.
 it could not have been more than 300 feet away. it was shaped like a brick and was, by volume, the largest thing i have ever seen in flight. it had four sides, each rectangular, and ends that were about one third the area of the sides, also rectangular. the sides were approximately 90 to 100 feet long, with the ends 40 feet wide and 30 feet tall. it was moving toward and parallel to the rear of my house. at a point directly behind my house it would have been about 25 feet (horizontally) from the building. it moved very slow, maybe 10 miles per hour, and was alarmingly low, less than 200 feet.
 the color was dull black, solid, seamless, with no windows or doors. the two sides and end that i could see were perfectly flat and non reflective. the perimeter of the lower face (bottom) of the object was encircled with large red and green lights the size and shape of footballs. the colors alternated with every other one being red or green. the lights switched on and off in sequence running clockwise around the perimeter with at least four equally spaced points off simultaneously, giving the impression of rotation (as a theater marquee). these lights easily numbered more than one hundred. there was no sound.
 the movement of this thing was straight ahead, with no deviation in altitude nor laterally. its flight was completely independent. there was nothing above or below the object and nothing pulling or pushing it through the sky.
 i watched, never looking away, until it disappeared behind my house (about 15 seconds).
 there is much more to describe but no space left to write.
content.summary: Brick shape craft @ 10mph, 200 feet altitude, level flight.Physically disabled me.

content.detailedDescription: We were in my apartment watching tv when my mom got up to go to the kitchen, she passed our balcony door and looked out and noticed four red-orange orbs flying in a wide group in the western sky heading north-north westward.  she called to me to come and look to see what i thought they might be.  i quickly grabbed my cell phone to record the strange lights. once the 4 reddish orbs stopped and hovered in the north west sky before they faded into the night sky. then there were 3 more orbs coming from the same direction but they came in single file heading towards the north west sky like the other 4 had been before they disappeared. once each orb reached where the previous 4 orbs had gathered they disappeared as well.. it was strange that they were close but made no sound and there were that many within a short amount of time, my brother had seen one like what we saw on friday aug. 16th but he only saw one it was in the same area moving exactly like what we saw then disappearing just as fast, around the same time as well 9pm..
content.summary: 4 redish orbs then followed by 3 reddish orbs

content.detailedDescription:
cloudy night.  no stars or planes visible.  i was walking dogs.  noticed a large, pulsing and flashing object in the sky to the nw.  i am familiar with the sky and area, there is no cell tower or anything there.  this was also much higher and at an altitude as that of a low flying plane.  object was stationary.  i watched for a few minutes and it did not move.  i took out my phone and nearest star on google star map was arcturus, this was not a star.  (i was sure this was the case based on its appearance but i was grasping at any explanation)  

the object was "tall"  it was more vertical than horizontal, up and down cylinder or egg shaped.  i would have to guess it's size by estimating distance:  i'd guess it was probably 5 miles away and 100-150 feet high.  the lights appeared white.  they seemed to flash or pulse.  the object seemed to be rotating or spinning in place in some way based on the way the light moved.  

i watched the object for approximately 10 minutes.  i turned to take care of my dogs and when i looked back it was gone completely.  i don't know if it took off or disappeared, unfortunately.  i also don't know how long it was there before i saw it.

i did try to take a photo with my camera but nothing came out.  you can't see it at all, it was too far away to pick up.
content.summary: Pulsing  flashing object in sky, stationary, large.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving a friend's house a little after 9:30pm, and saw the light as i approached my car. i asked another friend leaving at the same time, "what is that?" and pointed. she was oblivious to it, and continued talking, i repeated it and pointed again. she saw it, but was unimpressed. she said it was an airplane. i knew it was not. it was larger than any star or planet i have ever seen, about half the size of the moon, but not round. it was flashing or pulsating for about one second on, one second off, very regularly. when it was on, it looked vaguely round, but not perfectly round. the right side seemed to have a defined edge with an angle to it, while the left side appeared more fuzzy. it was not moving, but stayed about 45 degrees up, or halfway to zenith, just slightly east of north. when it was off, it could not be seen. the waxing moon at this time was a day or two past half-full, and was behind me. my friend went getting into her car by now, so i raised my flashlight and flashed it several times toward the object, but felt it was not going to react to my meaningless signal, so i didn't continue. i got in my car and headed home, only a little more than a mile away. i tried to keep it in sight, but was not able to, and by the time a got home less than 5 minutes later, i could no longer find it in the sky. while i was scanning the sky for it, i saw an airplane's flashing lights to the east, travelling south. at a lower altitude than the object i saw. i was disappointed to lose sight of it. i was excited to see a ufo and wanted to see more. i was not frightened.
content.summary: Large stationary pulsating white light

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, august 9th my girlfriend and i were traveling from new orleans to alexandria, la to spend the weekend with her family.  we were traveling south on i49 near bunkie, la when we exited on to highway 106 right off the interstate to quickly use the rest room.   as i turned to exit i saw something flash and catch my eye out the window.  we then stopped so she could use the restroom and i got out and looked again.  report is below:

i stopped the car got out and looked again and that���s when i saw a fuzzy or faded blue light moving in the sky towards the w/nw.  i strained hard to see it as it looked very fuzzy and then it started zig-zagging so to speak and becoming clearer.  at this same time i was trembling not believing what i was seeing and i asked my girlfriend if she could see it as well.  she said yes and then we both watched it together, kind of zig-zag about if you will.  after a minute or two of this we saw a normal aircraft cruising at roughly 20,000 to 30, 000 feet traverse the sky.  there was not a light around and the stars (including the milky way) were very clear.  the blue light then moved as a clear pin point, like a star, and shot up high into the atmosphere near where the plane was and traveled much much faster.  it then blinked out and then reappeared at another point well below where the plane had been.  the object then shot with such great speed clear across the sky, stopped, and completely changed directions back towards the west where i first observed it.  i felt fear, wonder and confusion as this was happening.  my girlfriend then decided we had been there long enough and wanted to go.  during this time, i attempted to capture the object on my iphone, but, there was not enough light to capture the image much less the stars.  i will gladly upload the images of blackness that i do have in case you can enhance them.  the event lasted for roughly 10 minutes.   it was hard to tell the distance of the object, but, my best guess would be anywhere from 5000 to 20000ft high and several miles away.  but, like i said, these distances were nothing to this object.  my coordinates were +30.856926 -92.222672.  mark 293 n/ nw.  time was around 1:00am. i will note that fort polk military base is in that direction.
content.summary: Spectacular blue light ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Was in stevensville, michigan at my vacation home and i opened the curtains an hour or so after sunset; it's a large bay window that face lake michigan.  very little light pollution in this area because it's so rural.  saw a bright light across the lake that didn't look like a star or commercial aircraft.  

through binoculars, i saw two bright, star-like objects hovering on the opposite side of the lake (i.E., over illinois, not michigan). one of the objects was brighter than the other and slightly above and to our left of it. the objects were too far away to discern details (even through binoculars) but they did not have blinking lights like commercial aircraft and were hovering instead of moving on a linear flight path.

the smaller object began to ascend slowly, moving in a few different locations to the left of the larger object.  suddenly, it zoomed off at an incredible speed and disappeared.  

no idea what they were...There was an air and water show in chicago this weekend so could be related to that.  however, i did see a ufo from my vacation home - also hovering over lake michigan - a few years ago.  this one had multi-color lights and it changed shapes so quite disimilar from this sighting.
content.summary: Two bright, star-like objects seen across lake michigan.  both hovered for a few minutes, then one took off extraordinarily quickly.

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog outside to do his business when i got home from work and witnessed an odd round glowing object shoot over the treeline going n to s. it appeared to have some small wing structure that circled the entire object. it looked like nothing i have ever seen before. i lost sight of the object as it disappeared in the trees. i am very confused as to what it was. this is the third ufo sighting here at valley of the moon i have witnessed in the past year.
content.summary: Glowing white round/solid object moving 40 mph across the treeline.

content.detailedDescription: My family, consisting of my wife and twin 8-year olds were traveling home on the evening of august 17, 2013 from a birthday party going east on delaware county road 100 s (which is better known as river valley road in the area) just outside of yorktown, indiana. a half-moon was out in the sky in the southeast and the few clouds were very high. many stars were visible even though the sun had gone down within the last hour. as we got about one mile from tiger drive, i noticed two flashing/pulsating lights over a crop field in the south east. the two lights were about 200-300 yards in the air. i pointed the lights out to my wife who had a better view from her passenger window. she immediately saw the lights and thought the lights were the top of a tower. and i also thought they might be the top lights on a tower. the lights consistently flashed a red/green light like an airplane or tower, and the lights were as high off the ground as a normal radio or cell phone tower. i immediately slowed the minivan down to about 30 mph as the lights continued to get closer to our right now more in the south. there appeared to be no movement and the lights were evenly spaced out from one another, which was roughly 10-20 feet. i was really getting excited as we approached the field that the lights were hovering over, because i could not explain what they were. they could have been airplanes, but they weren't moving. my wife was still convinced the lights were tower lights. my daughter and son in the backseat were both seeing the lights as i slowed to about 20 mph down the country road. we came to a place in the road where our vision was obstructed to the south by a group of trees. the lights were going to be directly to our south once we got past this small grouping of trees. it took less than 3 seconds for us to pass the trees, but the entire family lost the visual of the lights in that 3 seconds, and we did not see them once we passed the trees. i stopped the vehicle on the road just on the other side of the trees because the lights should have been directly south of us less than a 100 feet away in the sky. but the lights were not there. they were gone. i briefly jumped out of the car to scan the sky all around, but there was no visual on the lights. the area where the lights should have been was a large crop field (soybeans i believe) and there was a lot of open space to be able to see in all directions besides the large clump of roadside trees we had just passed. i jumped back into the van and asked everyone to look out their window, but no one could see the two lights. those lights should not have been able to disappear within that timeframe. disappointed, i jumped back in the car and told the family to stay on the lookout. i also turned my cell phone to camera/video mode just in case i saw them again. i continued east on river valley rd. still looking for the lights. i drove about 500 feet passed a small forest to our right and the lights were hovering in the sky at the same angle as before and the lights were flashing in the same manner. because the lights were again to our southeast, i wanted to drive further east on river valley road so we could get as close as possible. the trees became much thicker near the road in this area so my wife could not keep a constant visual of the lights. we drove about another tenth of a mile, and my wife said "there they are." so, i stopped the car right next to a residence on our left. i grabbed my cell phone and jumped out of the car. as i jumped out of the car, i could only see one of the lights. for about 5 seconds it was not moving--just hovering, then it suddenly and quickly moved back towards the west into being blocked by the trees. i had my cell phone out but i could not get a picture or video. it happened too fast. i got back in the car and my wife and children described the same as me. previously in the soybean field, we had never seen the two lights actually move. but as we stopped the car the light took off quickly to the west and out of sight. my son in the backseat said that he saw the light go up into the sky and disappear. my wife and i did not see it disappear into the sky. i turned around in the house's driveway to our left and drove west back down river valley road. no one in the car saw the lights again.   we stopped in a dirt road driveway to a farm about a tenth of a mile west of the original sighting of the lights. i got out of the car and scanned the sky for about 2 minutes and could not see the lights again. i decided to drive east to morrow's meadow on the white river just off tiger drive, which was about just over a mile from the original sighting. from afar, i saw a group of campers on the river as i crossed the bridge. at morrow's meadow there was a small reunion of roughly 20 people. i do not believe anyone could have seen the lights from morrow's meadows. the two lights could not have been more than two football fields in altitude, and they were congregated just north of the white river that runs through yorktown, indiana. needless to say, we could not explain these hovering, pulsating red/green lights that were not making sounds.
content.summary: Two strange red lights in field at about

content.detailedDescription:
Father and mother witnessed this video at approximatel 11pm   i witnessed just one of the objects around midnight  about 7 miles away on the same
night but it was by itself... hovering more or less with small directional change... no noise whatsoever
content.summary: Orange glowing somewhat stationary orb  like

content.detailedDescription: i live in a high rise apartment bldg. i was lying on the bed looking out the window, when i noticed it. i can see the jets take off from the airport and i was just looking at them. i noticed an object, all i could really make out was that it was two blue lights. they were side by side. it was in the distance and it went straight for a few miles, then it returned in the same direction it came from without stopping. that was when it got my attention. it did this a few times, then ascended at about a forty five degree angle. then it disappeared.
content.summary: I flew along the area of hartsfield airport. went across the flight path, three times. then assended.

content.detailedDescription:
On 7/4/2013 when we came outide after dark we saw the orbs hovering in the
tree and by the tree. the next day we found scourched leaves on the tree.
it is very common for us to see the orbs, they come in all different colors. some come close and some keep their distance.  the dog will bark
at the orbs and act aggresively toward them. we get a lot of orbs in the
house as well. one morning, i found an orb hovering by the side of my bed,
when i got up, it moved to the rear of the bed. we see ufo's often as well,
when we use the night vision goggles. we have alot of paranormal activity
as well.
content.summary: We came outside after dark and saw the orbs hovering there.

content.detailedDescription:
at 10:53 pm i looked out my window to the east and saw a large group of lights low in the night sky. i am a dedicated sky watcher and have seen many odd things but this was like nothing i have ever witnessed. i am also very familiar with aircraft.
  i called my wife and daughter to look and i ran outside onto the deck to witness the amazing spectacle of a huge mass of white lights in the ese direction, toward the snoqualmie pass area of the cascade mountains. there were dozens of lights all in close proximity to each other. ordinarily i would assume i was looking at aircraft lights but if these were airplanes there would have to have been 30 to 50 of them all in the same small sector of sky. they seemed to be moving in a southwesterly direction. they seemed to be a great distance from my location as they were not as bright as the airline planes that usually fly over my house on their way to seattle. they were not flashing nav lights like airplanes, they were solid white. also they moved slowly indicating that they were very far away, maybe 15-20 miles distant. the highest ones seemed almost to be in a line, tilting upward at the south end.
  i have to say that what they reminded me most of was the pictures of the aaa fire over baghdad during the iraq war. there were just dozens of lights (craft) in a small area. it gave the appearance of a mass dogfight in slow motion. after a couple of minutes they began fading out until only a few bright ones remained and then they faded out also. then there was nothing. the lights seemed to make no sound but they were far away.
  i am familiar with the chinese lantern type floating lights that people send up and have seen them many times. these did not match that description. there were too many and were too far away. they also moved too much for lanterns as the air was calm and no wind. also, chinese lantern don't fade out all at once.
  if they were aircraft, there had to be dozens of them. only the military has that many aircraft. i thought, maybe the army at ft. lewis was holding some maneuvers or maybe all their helicopters were making a late night return to base from the yakima firing range, but how could they just fade out in a minute? were they military flares? it seems unlikely since the forests are dry and it would be crazy for them to be dropping flares over the trees.
  maybe the oddest part of this sighting is that i can find no other report of this incident anywhere. we can't possibly be the only people who saw this. this spectacular event was in plain sight of a city of well over a million people and no one else saw it? i thought for sure it would be on the news or at least in the ufo reports from mufon but i don't see anything. anyone who was looking in the east could not have missed this incident.
content.summary: A large grouping of lights (dozens) in se sky. seemed to be moving to the sw. gave the appearance of a very large group of aircraft. then they faded out one by one untill all were gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I am doing my home work at that night, about 2 am at 2 feb 2013 i just get out my room for relax my legs. i drink water by glass and just see toward the sky. i thought that is airplane, i just wave my hands towards it just for my enjoyment. but i did not think what will happen next !

the object is going near about plane height, suddenly it comes about 300 ft on my head, there are 4 lights on its surface and 1 midal light, the midal light have leaser beam, i don't know it is leaser or not but it is red. the beam comes on my both eyes. its very terrific, i cant explain it on mail, i don't know english very well. the light is like 3d view. the object dose not have any sound. i means engine sound is not there.

i really fill very afraid to revise that moment now .

i wear a nighty at that night, in my pocket there is my samsung cell phone, when the object is on my head it was continuously vibrating, till 2 mints. the light is on my eye near about two minute. the main thing is that my cell phone battery was fully charge at 1.15 am and when the object is gone after 2 minute my cell phone battery have only 1 line of charging. i fill very seek and my hand and legs are shaking. i never told this incident to any one. because people never believe on me.


after 2 weeks 22 feb 2013 at 2.15 i sleep very hard because i am very tired, about 2.15 my cell phone is vibrating continuously, i wake up and see toward it the mobile screen having a flashing, i suddenly revise 2 feb's incident and i open the door and look towards the sky and the object is there, it is searching some thing that night, the 4 white light are search on ground, and sudden they come on me and i got short time blindness for a moment. my phone continuously vibrating, now the i can face the red light, i think they want to show me something, a shadow like image is printed on my mind and the light is off, and the flying object is gone.

i am very afraid then, for few days i spend my night on my friends room, i told him that i fear to sleep alone.

i don't no what kind of object is that. but i need your help,!

after that moment i change my room, i thought i am free from the object but it is not very easy to escape from it,

12 june 2013, 3.10 am, i am in my new room, at 3.10 am i wake up and go to the washroom, when i come out i saw the same flashing at sky, i feared and go to the room, my friends are sleep very deep, i saw towards my sell phone and pick up it. and put my had near to the window , the soft vibration is get started and it getting bigger slowly. i notice that my cell phone, the bluetooth is on, i off my sell phone's bluetooth, the vibration is stop and the flashing lights are still in the sky, the stop 5 mints in the sky and get away.

i saw the 2 images clearly.
i sketch the object on paper that time.
it is related to the bluetooth, and mobile.

they also search me after 4 moths, i don't know why. ?

please help me i really afraid.


21.0100��� n, 75.5667��� e are my city latitude and longitude .
content.summary: Laser beam on eye

content.detailedDescription:
Here's my footage [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

first off i want you guys to know i didn't fully believe in this stuff until last night. i went outside my house around 9pm to take the trash out and saw 2 very odd looking objects in the air. at first i thought it was 2 planes flying very close but then realized they weren't moving. then the split apart and the light emanating from them was unlike any plane i had ever seen. there was no sound that i could hear and they moved very little. they looked flat or disc shaped, maybe even like a boomerang. then i watched in pure shock as they shot up vertically into space at a ridiculous speed and vanished. i thought it was over but then my family and i saw a third one appear out of nowhere, this is when i grabbed my cell phone and tried to record it. my only regret is not filming long enough to show how insanely fast it ascended into space after hovering for over 2 minutes. here is my video, if you asked me if this stuff was real 2 days ago i would have laughed, now i feel like i got smacked with reality. 

appearance was bright orange with a tinge of white that encircled the ufo. the video doesn't properly show what it looked like to the naked eye. here is my video from last night. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Saw a total of three ufo's over churchville ny.

content.detailedDescription: Bright flashes like camera flash would make me look up and triangular set of lights above just looked like regular stars untill two moved towards each other and moved apart then two orbs started to fly close to me as if they where going to come down, they hovered above or floated their for awhile they were dull quite hard to see but still their i could feel their presence.Then the stars looked like they went and landed or joined into another star.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen stars move close together then go apart again.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:35pm 8/17/13 while on a cigarette break at work i noticed a star like object. my position was at the bottom of a valley looking upward through a tree line. at first the object appeared stationary, then i noticed slight motion like it was hovering. it made sight movements to my left and seemed to brighten when it moved. it made a definite path what i believe to be westward. it then slowly ascended and went away from me what i believe to be north. just before it faded away another object appeared where the first began. it followed the same basic path as the first. again just before it faded away a third object appeared and did the same. this time two more objects appeared, they were vey very close to one another at first and slowly drifted apart following the same path. i could still see the object prior to the two together and they made a triangular formation before they faded away from me still ascending. allegheny county airport is in very close proximity to where i viewed these objects. i wanted to dismiss this as mere helicopters but from my distance i should have seen strobe lights. the flight characteristics of the objects were also abnormal almost like the way a bumblebee flies. also it looked like the lights would brighten when making a move as if building up energy to do so. i'm not saying these were aliens but it was very unusual to me and i thought i should report it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple lights following same path. appeared to hover and change direction, two of the objects very close proximity. no strobes.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, 21-year-old son (the driver), and i were traveling north on telegraph road about 10:15 pm on friday, august 16, 2013 in monroe county, michigan.  we were between albain & dunbar roads when my husband looked out his east-facing passenger side window and said, "what are those orange lights in the sky?" my husband and i both saw 2 glowing orange-red lights which were larger than stars or planets. they were stacked one above the other, and both appeared to be rising in the sky over the fields to the east of telegraph road.  my husband commented that these could not be planes because they did not have any flashing navigation lights and because they appeared to be rising in altitude rather than flying straight across the sky as a plane or a helicopter would do.  we both found the lights to be fascinating to watch, so we kept looking at them while our son drove.  not more than a few seconds passed before the original 2 lights became what appeared to be a string of about 6 or 7 reddish-orange lights rising upward.  we commented to each other that the lights may have been over lake erie, which would be a couple of miles to the east of telegraph road. the lower altitude lights appeared to be farther away from us and the higher altitude lights appeared larger & closer to us. very quickly after we observed the line of lights, there appeared a cluster of the same type of lights near the bottom of the line of lights. altogether, my husband counted 17 lights total, the topmost lights being in the formation of a line with a cluster of lights at the bottom.  after this, buildings began to obstruct our view, so we could only see the topmost couple of lights.  we drove to veterans park on the river raisin in monroe (just west of telegraph road) and parked to watch the uppermost lights, which were still glowing orange in the sky.  as soon as we parked, these 2 lights that we could still view over the treetops seemed to fade and grow dim and then they disappeared.  they did not fly away.  they disappeared.
content.summary: Observed a line of ascending orange lights in south east sky...Seemed to come up from horizon...Increased from 2 about 17 lights

content.detailedDescription: Sitting around campfire saw the 1st one orange light quickly went out and seen black object zoom by fast, then there were 2 more that went over quickly from north east to south west their lights flickered then there was 3 more lights stayed on all had same direction same path and it was a straight line all was seen by 4 adults and a  5 year old
content.summary: Had orange lights that would blink out and stay out or stay completely on

content.detailedDescription: We observed 3 bright lights in unison flying low in the sky. it appeared triangular as if the lights belonged to one object. all of our neighbors came out to see it and everyone agreed it was different from anything we have ever witnessed.
content.summary: 3 white lights in unison that moved across low in the sky.  no blinking, no sound, moved slowing, appeared  together as if one  object. nothing like an airplane or helicopter

content.detailedDescription: After working a afternoon shift at the lake erie steel plant i proceeded home via the regional road.  the time was after 12:30 am.  a short distance past highway #6 which runs into port dover ontario, i saw a cluster of bright white lights through my front window.  these lights were much brighter than normal lights.  as i drove i watched the lights descending and i was trying to figure out how far away they were and what they were.  then they appeared to move into a straight line formation and start moving off to my left.  at that time i was slowing down to a stop on the side of the road to try and get a better look at what they were.  when i rolled down my window i then saw that it was a single craft and it had been right over my vehicle for a while as i drove.  i got out of the car and stood beside it at the side of the road and watched as this motionless craft hovered less than 50 ft above the field beside the road.  it made no noise. it didn't beam me up. and i wasn't afraid. the lights at this time were not visible. after several minutes it started to move south west and disappeared in about 5 seconds.  i have never seen anything move that fast. the night was clear and i had a great view of something i probably will never see again. not too many people believe me but my friend when i told him said his son came home after work at the same plant that night, had seen the same object but from down the road behind me.  he was very frightened. i had reported this to other groups but i have never been asked about my encounter. obviously my dates are going to be approximates since this happened years earlier.
content.summary: Right above car then moved off to hover for several minutes while i watched

content.detailedDescription:
this is a star-like object, a very bright point of light, i have seen this object before and it have a certain regilarity in when you can see it, i have recorded this object using a sony hd camcorder and you can see clearly that is a point of light, like a star, but this object moves not is straight line, so this is not an astronomical object or a man made satellite, this day 08/16/13 i first spotted the object around 7:30pm, still in daylight, a star in daylight, it first appeared on the north direction lower over the horizon, usually it moves not to much around the same point, but on 08/16/13 it moves up all the way to the zenith, and then it fades away on the west direction around 8:24pm.

 that day also i noticed a silent drone flying around, i have reported that here too, this drone in first view do not appear to have tail or winds, that is in the footage, but an closer look at hd still shots shows what appear to be shades of back rotating blades, so it looks like this was a drone checking the area.

 as i mentioned before i have observed this anomalous object many times and i have many hours of video recording of it, but with very low zooming lens, that day i was expecting it with a 402x60mm telescope and i managed to get extensive footage using this telescope.

 be aware that this object looks to be in the top levels of the atmosphere or near space.

 the object appear to have structure, a structure that i can't describe, and this object "eject" something in a frequent basis.

  i am attaching here a 200 seconds segment of footage part of an almost 40 minutes video recording that i have, that complete recording will be too big to upload here.

this was recorded using a modified security camera pc165dnr with 3-9mm lens attached to the telescope's eyepiece opening.

  when watching this video, please decrease brightness and increase contrast, i have the wrong settings when recording it, but doing this adjustment will compensate for that. what you will see will be very strange and definitely very, very interesting.
content.summary: Star-like anomalous object seen now using a 60mm telescope

content.detailedDescription:
Last night we drove home from western nc.  it rained the entire trip.  i say this to point out that we drove in the rain for two and a half hours and never saw one flash of lightning nor did we hear a single thunderclap.  

as we were driving on skeet club road we saw a round or ball shaped object flash very brightly over the roadway three times.  it was a very soft light blue color and it was right over the roadway about tree top level or, a little less.  it appeared to be about fifteen feet across with fuzzy edges, not clearly defined.  it flashed very brightly, like the flash from a camera.  it flashed two times rapidly, then a second or two went by and it flashed again.  the first two times it flashed it was right in front of the car and the last time it flashed it was right over the car. 

when it flashed the first two times i saw it's shape as being round.  but, the edges were not clearly defined.  it was just a light blue, very bright flashing object. 

i didn't see anything unusual before the first flash.  what i saw was two very bright flashes and then a blue object that rapidly faded out.  then the third flash that was right over us so, we didn't see anything but the flash due to the roof of the car blocking our possible view of anything that might have been there.  if i had time i would have tried to stop the car rather than drive under it but, it all happened very rapidly and i never had time to react.  

i suppose it could have been lightning and i started not to report it except that as far as i know there was no lightning associated with last night's rain.  it was cool all day with a light to moderate rain all day. 

there is no missing time or any other details to report.  also, it was perfectly silent.  we heard no sounds whatsoever.
content.summary: Light blue ball of light that flashed like a strobe

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on the balcony when i heard my neighbors talking about something in the sky.  i finally noticed something about a minute later coming from behind the trees.  it was four glowing lights in a trapezoidal formation traveling in a north westerly direction.  as i was viewing them a fifth light appeared behind the original four.  it was centered in back of the original four.  they were all a bright reddish-orange color and did not blink.  the light came from a bright center, gradually dimming outwards and appeared spherical.  they appeared like a flash like from a camera but it was constant.  it was not a satellite as i have seen those before.  i did not notice any type of indicator lights like you would normally see on an airplane.  the lights then dimmed to practically nothing.  all i could see was a very small pinpoint of light.  

i noticed them as i was facing east at about a 45 degree angle up from due east.  they traveled without changing formation until i was facing due north still at about 45 degrees up from north.  i took around ten minutes for them to travel from first sighting to last light out.

a few minutes later i noticed an airplane flying in the same direction at a higher rate of speed than the object was travelling.
content.summary: 4 in a trapezoidal pattern, one other following. lights gradually dimmed to nothing

content.detailedDescription: Sent to me by my wife in colorado. i am currently working in afghanistan. please view this tape she made with the surveillance camera she has set up on our property. i would appreciate any advice you have. feel free to contact my wife at [email removed/cms/tg]  thank you. it looks to me like something hanging in front of the camera. my wife has it all on camera.
content.summary: Sent to me by my wife in colorado glowing ball in our back yard by our barn

content.detailedDescription: I live across from my parents house.  we were watching the seattle seahawks and denver broncos pre season game. at the end of the 3rd quarter i went to my house to get a bottle of water.  when walking back i noticed this light to the west flashing randomly.  i thought it was a plane at first with the red and green flashing lights.  it was to bright to be a star and it wasn't moving.  i watched it for about 10 minutes and it didn't move and i noticed other colors flashing.  i am very familiar with aircraft lights.  i use to be a helicopter mechanic in the u.S. marines. i showed my dad and we watched it for a while.  i got a pair of binoculars and we watched it change colors over and over flashing in a random pattern.  aircraft lights are very steady.  after the game was over the light was still there.  the object was very far away and my phone wouldn't pick it up.  i got out my nikon d90 and put it on a tri pod and recorded it for a little bit.  the object never moved after about 2 hours.  i had to call it a night so i stopped watching it.
content.summary: Flashig light in sky.  never moved but had random flashes.  was not a star plane or satelite

content.detailedDescription: Stellar line left bellow the moon
content.summary: My son and me arrived from work and l looked at the moom then i noticed the smooked or cloud line left bellow the moon which stareted from north to south which lloked like something came into the atmosphere.
